title: Spaghetti Carbonara
author: Chef Mario
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs with Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Mix cooked spaghetti with pancetta, then stir in the egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and salt.
Serve hot.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
author: Chef Ayesha
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices.
Grill the chicken until cooked.
Prepare a sauce with tomato puree, cream, and spices.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce and simmer.
Serve with naan or rice.

title: Classic Pancakes
author: Chef Emma
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk wet ingredients in another bowl.
Combine wet and dry ingredients.
Heat a skillet and pour batter.
Cook until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with syrup or toppings of choice.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
author: Chef Li
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a wok.
Stir-fry garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
Add soy sauce and mix well.
Serve hot over rice or noodles.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
author: Chef Sophia
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream butter and sugars together.
Add eggs and vanilla extract to the mixture.
Mix dry ingredients separately and combine with wet ingredients.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Scoop dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.
Cool on a rack before serving.
